description: C# is a very powerful programming language and I am here to teach you that. When you have completed the course, you will know how to write C# programs, how to debug C# code. Not only do you learn C# for developing desktop applications, but you learn C# for working with ASP .NET web applications too. I have used example based approach rather than theoretical. You should enroll in this course to if you are just getting started with ASP .NET web development where C# is the main code behind language. You learn C# for developing desktop applications too. All in all, know this "You are about to learn a very powerful language"
title: Introduction to C#_ Getting Started
